title: Calories in Wendy's Spicy Nuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in Wendy's spicy nuggets for a 10-piece serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving tweaks to fit your diet.
assumptions: 10-piece serving of Wendy's Spicy Chicken Nuggets; breaded, fried, official nutrition data; no sauces or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; values based on Wendy's standard info. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A 10-piece serving of Wendy's Spicy Nuggets contains 440 calories and 23 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

Opt for regular nuggets instead of spicy (per nugget adjustment)
